sql-select.name: GetInstanceIOStatus
get disk I/O pressure
sql-select.description: Dynamic management function query to view disk I/O pressure
sql-select.sql-select-text:
SET NOCOUNT ON; SET DEADLOCK_PRIORITY LOW;
SELECT tSD.[name] AS [DatabaseName] ,mf.[name] AS [DatabaseFileName] ,mf.[physical_name] AS [physical_name] ,divfs.[num_of_reads] AS [num_of_reads] ,divfs.[num_of_bytes_read] AS [num_of_bytes_read] ,divfs.[io_stall_read_ms] AS [io_stall_read_ms] ,divfs.[num_of_writes] AS [num_of_writes] ,divfs.[num_of_bytes_written] AS [num_of_bytes_written] ,divfs.[io_stall_write_ms] AS [io_stall_write_ms] ,divfs.[io_stall] AS [io_stall] ,divfs.[size_on_disk_bytes] AS [size_on_disk_bytes] ,CASE WHEN (ISNULL(divfs.[num_of_reads], 0.0) <= 0.01) THEN -1.0 ELSE CONVERT([DECIMAL](38,4), divfs.[io_stall_read_ms]) / CONVERT([DECIMAL](38,4), divfs.[num_of_reads]) END AS [AvgIOReadStallMs] ,CASE WHEN (ISNULL(divfs.[num_of_reads], 0.0) <= 0.01) THEN N'N/A' WHEN (CONVERT([DECIMAL](38,4), divfs.[io_stall_read_ms]) / CONVERT([DECIMAL](38,4), divfs.[num_of_reads]) < 100.0) THEN N'very good' WHEN (CONVERT([DECIMAL](38,4), divfs.[io_stall_read_ms]) / CONVERT([DECIMAL](38,4), divfs.[num_of_reads]) < 120.0) THEN N'okay' WHEN (CONVERT([DECIMAL](38,4), divfs.[io_stall_read_ms]) / CONVERT([DECIMAL](38,4), divfs.[num_of_reads]) < 150.0) THEN N'slow, needs attention' WHEN (CONVERT([DECIMAL](38,4), divfs.[io_stall_read_ms]) / CONVERT([DECIMAL](38,4), divfs.[num_of_reads]) >= 150.0) THEN N'Serious I/O bottleneck' ELSE N'?' END AS [AvgIOReadStallStatus] ,CASE WHEN (ISNULL(divfs.[io_stall_write_ms], 0.0) <= 0.01) THEN -1.0 ELSE CONVERT([DECIMAL](38,4), divfs.[io_stall_write_ms]) / CONVERT([DECIMAL](38,4), divfs.[num_of_writes]) END AS [AvgIOWriteStallMs] ,CASE WHEN (ISNULL(divfs.[num_of_writes], 0.0) <= 0.01) THEN N'N/A' WHEN (CONVERT([DECIMAL](38,4), divfs.[io_stall_write_ms]) / CONVERT([DECIMAL](38,4), divfs.[num_of_writes]) < 10.0) THEN N'very good' WHEN (CONVERT([DECIMAL](38,4), divfs.[io_stall_write_ms]) / CONVERT([DECIMAL](38,4), divfs.[num_of_writes]) < 20.0) THEN N'okay' WHEN (CONVERT([DECIMAL](38,4), divfs.[io_stall_write_ms]) / CONVERT([DECIMAL](38,4), divfs.[num_of_writes]) < 50.0) THEN N'slow, needs attention' WHEN (CONVERT([DECIMAL](38,4), divfs.[io_stall_write_ms]) / CONVERT([DECIMAL](38,4), divfs.[num_of_writes]) >= 50.0) THEN N'Serious I/O bottleneck' ELSE N'?' END AS [AvgIOWriteStallStatus] FROM [sys].[dm_io_virtual_file_stats](NULL, NULL) divfs LEFT OUTER JOIN [sys].[master_files] mf ON mf.[database_id] = divfs.[database_id] AND mf.[file_id] = divfs.[file_id] LEFT OUTER JOIN [master].[sys].[databases] tSD ON tSD.[database_id] = mf.[database_id] ORDER BY tSD.[name] ,mf.[name] ,mf.[physical_name] ;
